page.description: Set the value of a IEEE floating point number of the blob.
page.original:
.POKEN() Syntax .POKEN( Position as N, Floating_Point_Value as N ) ArgumentDescription PositionThe position to write the data. Floating_Point_ValueAn 8 byte floating point number.
Description The .POKEN() method sets a IEEE 8 byte floating point number at Position in a blob to a Floating_Point_Value. The first position is 1. Example b4 = file.to_blob("C:\Wallpaper\ruth_2_081003.jpg") b4.poken(10,12345)
See Also Blob Functions and Methods
